clauses.title: The service can delete specific content without reason and may do it without prior notice
clauses.description: This service can delete specific content. Usually they will claim they reserve the right to do it at their sole discretion, which is legalese for saying they won't give a specific reason. If the terms say they will not notify you, it shall be included in the quote but if it does not explicitly say they will give you a notice, it can be reasonably inferred that they can do it without telling you.
clauses.clause_text: STiBaRC (the organization), moderators, and the owner (Joshua Herron, aka herronjo), collectively referred to as they, reserve the right to remove or modify posts or content as needed, whether or not they violate any of the content policies defined above.

case.text: Specific content can be deleted without reason and may be removed without prior notice

clauses.title: This service employs third-party cookies
clauses.clause_text: Cookies may also be used by third parties

case.text: Third party cookies are employed, but with opt out instructions

clauses.title: This service does not track you
clauses.description: The document excerpt needs to include the words "[the service] does not track [users]" or "[the service] does not use any tracking technology".
clauses.clause_text: we do not track you

case.text: You are not being tracked

clauses.title: You can delete your content from this service
clauses.description: You can ask the service to remove your content at any time, and it's deleted within a reasonable time.
clauses.clause_text:
Generated through the annotate view

Although deletion of content is not guaranteed, it can be requested, and the site has precedent for upholding such requests (see, for example, https://stibarc.com/user.html?id=alluthus, who had a large amount of content deleted upon request).

case.text: You can delete your content from this service

clauses.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data
clauses.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text:
If you chose to show any personal information when you created your account, and wish to hide it, you can stop showing your name, email address, or birthday individually by choosing "Edit profile" on official STiBaRC software.
You can view the personal information you provided on this same page.

case.text: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

clauses.title: The service does not share user information with third parties
clauses.description: Information collected from users by this service is not given to third parties.
clauses.clause_text: Personal data we collect is not shared with third parties.

case.text: Your personal data is not shared with third parties

clauses.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.
clauses.clause_text: When you create an account, we collect your username, password, name (if provided), email address (if provided), birthday (if provided), and preferences regarding whether this information should be displayed on your profile.

case.text: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect

clauses.title: The services will notify users if personal data has been affected by data breaches
clauses.description: Should the personal information of a service be compromised, the service will inform users if any personal data has been affected by data breaches. This case is also related to privacy.
clauses.clause_text:
All user data is stored separate from the website, on a database not accessible to the outside world. All access to the database is logged and is reviewed frequently.
If an intrusion is found, all affected users will be notified appropriately and quickly.

case.text: You will be notified if personal data has been affected by data breaches

clauses.title: This service does not sell your personal data
clauses.description: This service makes an explicit promise not to sell "personal data" of users.
clauses.clause_text: Information that is not public will not be sold, rented, or given to anyone.

case.text: Your personal data is not sold

clauses.title: The user is informed about security practices
clauses.description: It's important to know what security measures are taken to protect your data from unauthorized access. This case applies to the Agreements that precisely explain their security practices.
clauses.clause_text:
Information not publicly displayed is not accessible to anyone, even through the API, except to the associated user and us.
Your password is never stored in plain text. As soon as it is sent to the server, it is quickly hashed and removed from memory before any other process begins handling the information.

case.text: Information is provided about security practices

clauses.title: This service assumes no responsibility and liability for the contents of links to other websites
clauses.description: The service rejects any responsibility for the contents of other websites to which it links.
clauses.clause_text: We are not responsible for the content or privacy practices of third-party websites.

case.text: This service assumes no responsibility and liability for the contents of links to other websites

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.
clauses.clause_text: Last updated 03/25/2019

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: This service prohibits users sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages
clauses.description: Users are not allowed to use the service for chain letters, junk mail, spamming or any other distribution of content to people who have not agreed to receiving it.
clauses.clause_text: This is a list item under "The following types of content are prohibited:".

case.text: You are prohibited from sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages

clauses.title: You are prohibited from posting content which promotes violence or politically or religiously extremist values.
clauses.description: Users are not allowed to post extremist political or religious content. They are also not allowed to post content that glorifies violence.
clauses.clause_text:
On 2024-09-05 19:17:49 UTC, fedada (30172)  Suspended wrote:
          The color of your blog is quite great. i would love to have those colors too on my blog.;’”-: 카지노커뮤니티

case.text: You are prohibited from posting content which promotes violence or politically or religiously extremist values.

clauses.title: Users who have been permanently banned from this service are not allowed to re-register under a new account
clauses.description: Once users have been permanently banned from this service, they are not allowed to create a new account to keep using the service.
clauses.clause_text: Creating additional account(s) for the purpose of evading bans or other restrictions

case.text: Users who have been permanently banned from this service are not allowed to re-register under a new account

clauses.title: Users agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content
clauses.description: This service prohibits users from submitting content of a variety of types. This can include content that is unlawful, harassing, abusive, threatening, libelous, sexist, racist, homophobic, transphobic, or discriminatory in any other way.
clauses.clause_text: Threats or harassment

case.text: You agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content

clauses.title: Prohibits the posting of content which promotes or glorifies violence or politically or religiously extremist values.
clauses.description: Users are not allowed to post extremist political or religious content. They are also not allowed to post content that glorifies violence.
clauses.clause_text:
This is a list item under "The following types of content are prohibited:"

Violent and extremist content would likely fall under the broad language of "Offensive content in any way".

case.text: You are prohibited from posting content which promotes violence or politically or religiously extremist values.

clauses.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age
clauses.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.
clauses.clause_text: You must be at least 13 years of age to create an account or otherwise submit information to the service.

case.text: This service is only available to users over a certain age

clauses.title: Prohibits the posting of pornographic content
clauses.description: Users are not allowed to post any content of pornographic nature. This includes adult content, things that are sexually explicit, or obscene.
clauses.clause_text: Pornography or nudity

case.text: The posting of pornographic content is prohibited

clauses.title: The service can suspend your account for several reasons
clauses.clause_text: They also reserve the right to ban or commandeer any user account as they see fit, as long as a reason is provided.

case.text: Your account can be suspended for several reasons

clauses.title: Users agree not to use the service for illegal purposes
clauses.description: The user agrees not to commit any unlawful acts through the use of the website, including the posting of illegal content or messaging.
clauses.clause_text: Actions that are illegal in the state of Ohio or in your jurisdiction

case.text: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

clauses.title: This service requires first-party cookies
clauses.description: First-party cookies only belong to the domain of the service and not a third party.
clauses.clause_text: We may use cookies on the website and other official STiBaRC software.

case.text: First-party cookies are used

clauses.title: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.
clauses.description: The Terms may be updated without prior notice, but users will be notified of the changes at the moment they will start applying.
clauses.clause_text: Users will be notified of changes to this privacy policy through posts on STiBaRC itself, the official STiBaRC Twitter (@STiBaRC and @STiBaRC_Team), and potentially email if the change is important to how user data privacy is handled.

case.text: The terms may be changed at any time, but you will receive notification of the changes

clauses.title: Third parties are involved in operating the service
clauses.clause_text:
This third-party software is listed here:
The website uses PayPal to offer the user the option to donate money. The PayPal Privacy Policy can be viewed at https://www.paypal.com/us/webapps/mpp/ua/privacy-full

case.text: Third parties are involved in operating the service

clauses.title: This service collects your IP address, which can be used to view your approximate location
clauses.clause_text: Your IP address is collected as part of standard server logs.

case.text: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location

clauses.title: Users agree not to submit illegal content
clauses.clause_text:
The following types of content are prohibited:
* Content that is illegal in the state of Ohio or in your jurisdiction

case.text: You agree not to submit illegal content
